body: @FabioPinheiro @elribonazo when running locally there's the docker network issue because SDK runs outside docker and is not able to communicate to the mediator I mean, the SDK resolves the did service endpoint as `http://identus-mediator:8080` so it doesn't work
@FabioPinheiro I noticed this line has a typo https://github.com/hyperledger/identus/blob/main/identus-docker/docker-compose.yaml#L58
